docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

docs.title: mris_make_surfaces
docs.description: Positions the tessellation of the cortical surface at the white matter surface, then the gray matter surface, generating surface files along with a curvature file and a surface file for cortical thickness.

docs.title: Subject Name
docs.description: Name of the subject

docs.title: Hemisphere
docs.description: Brain hemisphere (r or l)

docs.title: White Surface Name
docs.description: Output name for white surface (default is 'white'). Set to NOWHITE to generate but not save white surface.

docs.title: Pial Surface Name
docs.description: Output name for pial surface (default is 'pial').

docs.title: White-only Flag
docs.description: Only generate white matter surface.

docs.title: No-White Flag
docs.description: Only generate pial surface.

docs.title: Original White Surface
docs.description: Specify a white surface to start with.

docs.title: Original Pial Surface
docs.description: Specify a pial surface to start with.

docs.title: Q Flag
docs.description: Omit self-intersection and only generate gray/white surface.

docs.title: Maximum Gray Scale
docs.description: Set maximum gray scale value.

docs.title: C Flag
docs.description: Do not create curvature and area files from white matter surface.

docs.title: Cortex Flag
docs.description: Set to 0 to turn off creation of cortex label file.

docs.title: W Argument
docs.description: Unused argument

docs.title: First WM Peak Flag
docs.description: Settle WM surface at first peak in intensity profile instead of highest.

docs.title: Average Curvature
docs.description: Average curvature values a number of times (default=10).

docs.title: Average Pial Curvature
docs.description: Average pial curvature values a max of a number of times (default=16).

docs.title: Average White Curvature
docs.description: Average white curvature values a max of a number of times (default=4).

docs.title: T1 Volume
docs.description: Specify T1 volume (default is brain).

docs.title: White Volume
docs.description: Specify white volume and <hires> option.

docs.title: Longitudinal Flag
docs.description: Run longitudinal analysis.

docs.title: Dura Threshold
docs.description: Set a threshold for the multi-echo mprage dura avoidance.

docs.title: Subjects Directory
docs.description: Specify SUBJECTS_DIR.

docs.title: Erase Cerebellum Flag
docs.description: Erase cerebellar labeled voxels if aseg is loaded.

docs.title: WM Weight
docs.description: Weighting of WM mean in calculating T2 threshold of disallowed GM values, default=3.

docs.title: Sigma Above
docs.description: # of sigmas above the mean to allow gray matter T2 intensities.

docs.title: Sigma Below
docs.description: # of sigmas below the mean to allow gray matter T2 intensities.

docs.title: Min T2 Inside
docs.description: Specify threshold for min T2 value allowed to be interior to the cortical ribbon.

docs.title: Max T2 Inside
docs.description: Specify threshold for max T2 value allowed to be interior to the cortical ribbon.

docs.title: Min T2 Outside
docs.description: Specify threshold for min T2 value outside of pial surface that will cause surface to deform outwards.

docs.title: Max T2 Outside
docs.description: Specify threshold for max T2 value outside of pial surface that will cause surface to deform outwards.

docs.title: Min Peak %
docs.description: Specify the pct of the histo peak in the local gm histogram to use as threshold for finding the local inside and outside gm thresholds.

docs.title: Border Vals Hires
docs.description: Turn on hires options in MRIScomputeBorderValues_new(). May not be helpful.

docs.title: No Unitize
docs.description: Turn off face normal unitization.

docs.title: Intensity Cost
docs.description: Set weight of intensity cost.

docs.title: Curvature Cost
docs.description: Set weight of curvature cost.

docs.title: Tangential Spring Cost
docs.description: Set weight of tangential spring cost.

docs.title: Normal Spring Cost
docs.description: Set weight of normal spring cost.

docs.title: Repulsion Cost
docs.description: Set weight of repulsion force.

docs.title: Save Target
docs.description: Save target surface for debugging.

docs.title: Save Residual
docs.description: Save residual for debugging.

docs.title: Vertex Number
docs.description: Set Gdiag_no to vertex number.

docs.title: Diagnostic Vertex
docs.description: Set Gdiag_no to vertex number and turn off writing of cortex label or curvature files.

docs.title: Rip File
docs.description: Save ripflag as overlay. Specify full path including hemi, suffix, etc.

docs.title: Sigma White File
docs.description: Save white surface sigma as overlay. Specify full path including hemi, suffix, etc.

docs.title: Sigma Pial File
docs.description: Save pial surface sigma as overlay. Specify full path including hemi, suffix, etc.

docs.title: Output Suffix
docs.description: Append suffix to all outputs to prevent over-writing.

docs.title: Min Border White
docs.description: Minimum border white.

docs.title: Max Border White
docs.description: Maximum border white.

docs.title: Min Gray at White Border
docs.description: Minimum gray at white border.

docs.title: Max Gray
docs.description: Maximum gray value.

docs.title: Max Gray at CSF Border
docs.description: Maximum gray at CSF border.

docs.title: Min Gray at CSF Border
docs.description: Minimum gray at CSF border.

docs.title: Max CSF
docs.description: Maximum CSF value.

docs.title: mris_make_surfaces
docs.description: Positions the tessellation of the cortical surface at the white matter surface, then the gray matter surface, generating surface files along with a curvature file and a surface file for cortical thickness.
